statements: SELECT * FROM theater_memberships;
SELECT id, member_name FROM theater_memberships ORDER BY membership_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_level = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships ORDER BY membership_start_date ASC;
SELECT id, member_name, membership_start_date, membership_expiry_date FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, member_name, membership_level, membership_start_date, membership_expiry_date FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_level = 'Gold' ORDER BY membership_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND membership_expiry_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT member_name, COUNT(*) as total_memberships FROM theater_memberships GROUP BY member_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT membership_level, AVG(DATEDIFF(membership_expiry_date, membership_start_date)) as avg_membership_duration FROM theater_memberships GROUP BY membership_level;
SELECT DISTINCT membership_level FROM theater_memberships ORDER BY membership_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships;
SELECT member_name, membership_level FROM theater_memberships ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, expiry_date FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_level = 'Gold' ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_memberships, membership_level FROM theater_memberships GROUP BY membership_level;
SELECT member_name, benefit_name FROM theater_memberships JOIN theater_benefits ON theater_memberships.membership_level = theater_benefits.membership_level;
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_level = 'Platinum';
SELECT membership_id, member_name, expiry_date FROM theater_memberships ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, membership_level FROM theater_memberships WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT membership_level FROM theater_memberships;
SELECT t.member_name, b.benefit_name FROM theater_memberships t JOIN theater_benefits b ON t.membership_level = b.membership_level WHERE b.benefit_name LIKE '%Discount%';
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships;
SELECT member_name, membership_start_date FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT benefit_description FROM benefits WHERE benefit_type = 'discount';
SELECT membership_id, member_name FROM theater_memberships ORDER BY membership_id DESC;
SELECT membership_id, membership_start_date, membership_expiry_date FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_expiry_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND membership_expiry_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT member_name, membership_start_date FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_memberships FROM theater_memberships;
SELECT member_name, benefit_description FROM theater_memberships JOIN benefits ON theater_memberships.membership_id = benefits.benefit_id;

SELECT member_name, benefit_description, expiry_date FROM theater_memberships JOIN benefits ON theater_memberships.membership_id = benefits.benefit_id JOIN expiry_dates ON theater_memberships.membership_id = expiry_dates.membership_id ORDER BY member_name DESC, expiry_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships;
SELECT member_name, membership_type FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_type='Premium';
SELECT * FROM benefits ORDER BY benefit_value DESC;
SELECT theater_name, location FROM theaters WHERE theater_capacity > 500;
SELECT DISTINCT membership_type FROM benefits;
SELECT * FROM theaters WHERE theater_capacity > 500;
SELECT theater_name, location FROM theaters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT DISTINCT membership_type FROM benefits;
SELECT member_name, start_date, expiry_date FROM theater_memberships ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT benefit_description, benefit_value FROM benefits WHERE benefit_value > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships;
SELECT member_name, membership_type FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_type = 'Premium';
SELECT theater_name, address, city, country FROM theaters ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT theater_name, COUNT(location_id) AS location_count FROM theaters LEFT JOIN locations ON theaters.theater_id = locations.theater_id GROUP BY theater_name;
SELECT DISTINCT benefit_type FROM benefits;
SELECT * FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_type = 'Gold' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, start_date, expiry_date FROM theater_memberships WHERE membership_type = 'Platinum' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT theater_name, address, city, country FROM theaters WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT location_name, capacity, status FROM locations WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC, location_name ASC;
SELECT membership_id, benefit_name, benefit_type FROM benefits WHERE benefit_type = 'Discount' ORDER BY benefit_name ASC;
